Hehehe. Sorry, man, but you won. It was either stay and die or live 
to fight another day.

::Killfest/Greven/Scyther/Demise/EndBringer::

Killfest growls as shots hit the foliage around him. Without being 
told, his team spreads out, making themselves harder to hit. They 
were all surrounded by trees and bushes, except for Scyther who was 
cloaked above the trees.

Killfest activates the inner communication system of his group. "On 
my command, turn, aim, and open fire, then resume retreat."

He takes a few steps and spinns around. "Now."

A missile launcher flipping over his shoulder, Killfest fires two 
missiles at Putam. He pulls a missile launcher out of a side 
compartment, firing two more. The missiles turn, locking on to Putam 
and following him. Killfest turns, resuming the run again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven spins around on Killfest's command, ignoring an energon beam 
that hit him. He fires four missiles at Akron, and then spins around 
and runs off.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther spins in the air, firing down three charges at Odiphious and 
then spinning back around and flying off again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise, knowing he had no long-distance weapons to contribute, 
continued to smash through threes, most of the bolts missing him as 
he made his way toward the Predacon cave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer smiles, listening to Killfest's orders. He spins around as 
commanded, firing four signature-seeking missiles at Venus. Spinning 
back around, EndBringer takes off through the bushes again.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Damn it! Just when I sit down to get into the battle Yan has to 
pull out. 
> This isnt over!
> 
>     Megatron watched the Predacons pull out, or retreat, or do 
whatever they 
> were going to do. As he recived the information on thier base 
status, he was 
> tempted to follow them, and crush them durring there brief 
confusion. But, 
> looking at the smoldering woods and his hurt predacons he put that 
thought on 
> hold.
>     "Return to base. Victory is ours once agian. Next time we meet 
with 
> Killfests bunch, they will not live to see another battle. It will 
end next 
> time." He said, looking off into the distance, some what entranced.
> 
>     As for the Energonians, they watched them go. The foursome 
landed and 
> regrouped briefly. Putnam spoke first: "we will follow them! They 
will not 
> get away with such a dishonorable escape."
>     Akron nodded. Odiphious, with a solem face reminded them of 
Ominous with 
> the girl, but Putnam put to rest his worries. The four of them 
turned towrd 
> the fleeing Predacons and pressed after them, taking to the air for 
a hasty 
> pursuit. All the while they would send blast after blast at them.
